title: Tech alone wont raise farm yields

tasks.task: Starting and operating a digital agriculture platform
subtasks: Creating and maintaining a mobile app (Farm Crowdie)
Connecting investors with small-scale farmers across Nigeria
Facilitating investments in crops like maize, rice, soya, and cassava
Matching investors with specific farmers and farming projects
Providing updates to investors via photos, videos, and text
Enabling investors to visit their partnered farmers' farms
Managing the investment cycle from start to harvest
Returning investors their money after the harvest season
Offering investors the ability to experience the entire farming cycle remotely
Connecting farmers with necessary inputs (seeds, fertilizer)
Providing technical know-how to farmers via digital channels
Implementing USSD codes and touchpoints for farmer support
Giving farmers market access for their produce
Identifying and working with ambassador farmers for yield demonstration
Showcasing successful cases to inspire other farmers
Improving farmers' knowledge and engagement through technology adoption
